suggest.amasty/blog-page-builder: Install blog-page-builder module to activate PageBuilder and Blog Pro integration.
suggest.amasty/blog-graphql: Install blog-graphql module to activate Graphql and Blog Pro integration.
suggest.amasty/module-blog-mftf-3: Install module-blog-mftf-3 module to be able to run Blog Pro MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
suggest.amasty/module-blog-pro-to-builder: Install Amasty_BlogProToBuilder module to activate the integration with Custom Reports Builder extension and create valuable reports about your blog posts.
